pages.text: explosion release is the kg of earth and lightning, it currently contains 3 moves

pages.title: Landmine fist
pages.text: upon use of this jutsu the user will receive an effect that causes an explosion upon punching a mob, the damage,shockwave and cost of this punch is determiend by the charge of the jutsu, using the jutsu again will remove this effect. $(br) $(li)max charge: 10 $(li)jutsuxp needed: 150 $(li)chakra taken at max charge: 300 $(li)Chakra per punch at max: 190

pages.title: Explosive clay
pages.text: Upon charging this jutsu the user will realise that holding it allows for 3 different stages (c1,c2 and c3) $(li)c1 $(li2)summons small vex like dolls that will target a mob if the user punches in their direction $(li2)chakra taken:75

$(li)C2 $(li2)Upon use of c2 the user will summon a phantom looking clay doll, this functions similar to the C1 dolls but also acts as a mount for the user $(li2)Chakra taken:150 $(li)C3 $(li2)upon using C3 a giant puppet will be created before promptly nuking its-self dealing a large area of damage $(li2)chakra taken:225 $(li)jutsuxp needed:200

pages.title: Explosive clone
pages.text: When this jutsu is used the user will spawn a clone that will charge a target and explode.$(br)$(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:150$(li)Jutsuxp needed:200
